name: Army Urban Combat - Sniper Assassin Shoot To Kill Edition
name_original: Army Urban Combat - Sniper Assassin Shoot To Kill Edition
description:
** HEADSHOTS, SNIPER KILLS, AND MORE! **
** AWESOME SNIPER SHOOTER ACTION! **

Get ready for an action packed sniper shooting game where you are up against an army of bad guys! You are the "best of the best" on a mission to take out all of them once and for all. Armed with your favorite shooter and sniper rifle, you are the last of your squad, so the fate of the mission is in your hands!
